page.title: 04The School Nature garden
page.content: The children turned the school garden into a nature garden complete with pool. Much work had to be done because part of the garden was neglected and full of lots of rubbish such as old iron and plastic bags. I am Emma wellings aged 11 and one day I went to the nature garden on March 20th 1985 and wrote; {Our nature garden. Looking at our Jumble litter of a garden, I thought in my mind what it would look like if we tried hard. Digging and turning the hard cold litter ground, to be a bright and brilliant place to be, With flowers and trees full of birds and a fish pond right in the middle. But that is all in the future all we have now is a tangle scramble mess.
